content:
As I read that letter from Odyl, I was overwhelmed with emotion. All these years, I had no idea that Odyl had feelings for me, and here it was, written down in black and white. To hear that she had loved me for so long, even though we couldn't be together, was both heartbreaking and exhilarating. I had always felt a deep connection to Odyl, but I had never allowed myself to entertain the possibility of anything more than friendship, given our circumstances.

Reading her words made me realize just how much I had been holding back, how much I had been denying my own feelings. It was as if a weight had been lifted, and suddenly everything made sense. All the little moments we had shared over the years, the stolen kisses and touches, the unspoken tension - it all fell into place. I knew then that I loved her too, and that I wanted to be with her, no matter the cost.
